column4: the internet was working just fine in ubuntu 7.04 so I upgraded to ubuntu 7.10 and now the internet goes very slow, its takes about 2 minutes to load a page, I have tried a live ubuntu 7.04 cd and the internet is fast again. so I know its not my internet cable.
sorry but I already downgraded back to ubuntu 7.04
because the internet is so slow I can't use the computer
sounds like a ipv6 issue to me.
